description:
In this course we will use Construct 2 (free version is ok) to create the first level of a platform game similar to Super Mario Bros.  Platform games are a great way to get your feet wet in the world of game development.

I create the game used in the course from scratch once, and then recreate again while recording and explaining exactly what I am doing.

You will learn by watching the videos and following along at your own pace, pausing when needed.  I try to pause at key spots to give you a chance to get a good look and understanding of what I am teaching.  

If you are a beginner to Construct 2 or game design in general, this is a great class for you.

Source Code, Graphics, and Sound files are all included.
title: Platform Game Creation With Construct 2 (HTML5)
